brunch1.description: Mother's Day brunch at a Chinese dim sum restaurant with Nana and friends.  This is Wendy, Nadav and 5 month-old Eli.
brunch1.title: Brunch 1

brunch2.description: Dan, Jennifer, and 5 month old Hazel.
brunch2.title: Brunch 2

brunch3.description: Milo has been in a fantastic mood after eating.  And he's been eating a ton.  He ate more dim sum than Felix, and nearly as much as Lucie.
brunch3.title: Brunch 3

brunch4.description: Felix loves his new shoes.  They have a fire engine whose lights blink when you run.  These shoes have actually got him running, blocks at a time, which is a completely new thing for us.
brunch4.title: Brunch 4

brunch5.description:
For someone her age, Hazel sat remarkably well at a high chair. However, she is too young for real food, so all she had to eat was the table. Note the well-soaked spot in the table cloth.

If you want to learn more about this cutie, visit her website. Her parents are as obsessive as we are about documenting her weekly development.
brunch5.title: Brunch 5

light.description: Note the pacifier's in sideways. Sometimes he puts the entire thing in his mouth.
light.title: Light

nana2.description: Nana's in town for work.  How convenient!
nana2.title: Nana 2

nana3.description: We're not sure if Milo remembered Nana, but he took to her quickly.
nana3.title: Nana 3

stairs1.description: Milo gets his stair exercise every day.   He even knows how to back down carefully.
stairs1.title: Stairs 1

stairs2.description: Felix climbed over the baby gate using a stool, and is taunting Milo with his privileged position.
stairs2.title: Stairs 2

teletubbies2.description: Tinky winky works his tubby magic.
teletubbies2.title: Teletubbies 2

teletubbies3.description: Farting teletubbies is funny to 66% of the audience.
teletubbies3.title: Teletubbies 3

description:
Our nanny woes continue: the nanny we loved, who was supposed to start Monday, developed back problems and had to cancel. We're not yet sure what we'll do. It's a good thing that Lucie loves spending time with Milo, because she's sure spending a lot of it.

Milo's got 3 teeth coming in right now, but isn't too grumpy about it.

Felix still has some very cute Franglais going on. Samples:
  • This is just to make joli.
  • The door is locked à clef
  • It's "à table" time.
  • Come over here, my little chérie. (Talking to Lucie)
  • Help! My culotte is in my cul-cul.
  • I love Max un petit peu, but I love Jasper easier.
  • I think Milo is mignon.
  • Papa is very costaud.
  • I'm a kitchener.
  • I soif.
  • Keenan's cat griffed me.
title: May 8
